info.title: Philips HUE
info.description: Philips HUE allows you to control smart home devices, like lights, switches, plugs and more built by Philips.

description.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem.
description.title: Error description

errors.description: Errors that occurred during the call.

action_values.description: List of alert effects that the light supports.
action_values.title: Action values

gamut_type.description: The gamut types supported by hue: A - Gamut of early Philips color-only products, B - Limited gamut of first Hue color products, C - Richer color gamut of Hue white and color ambiance products, other - Color gamut of non-hue products.
gamut_type.title: Gamut type

mirek.description: Color temperature in mirek or null when the light color is not in the ct spectrum.
mirek.title: Mirek

mirek_maximum.description: Maximum color temperature this light supports.
mirek_maximum.title: Mirek maximum

mirek_minimum.description: Minimum color temperature this light supports.
mirek_minimum.title: Mirek minimum

mirek_valid.description: Indication whether the value presented in mirek is valid.
mirek_valid.title: Mirek valid

brightness.description: Brightness percentage. value cannot be 0, writing 0 changes it to lowest possible brightness.
brightness.title: Brightness

min_dim_level.description: Percentage of the maximum lumen the device outputs on minimum brightness.
min_dim_level.title: Min dim level

speed.description: Speed of dynamic palette or effect. The speed is valid for the dynamic palette if the status is dynamic_palette or for the corresponding effect listed in status. In case of status none, the speed is not valid.
speed.title: Speed

speed_valid.description: Indicates whether the value presented in speed is valid.
speed_valid.title: Speed valid

status.description: Current status of the lamp with dynamics.
status.title: Status

status_values.description: Statuses in which a lamp could be when playing dynamics.
status_values.title: Status values
